name: Time Is Gold
description:
Time is Gold is a First-Person Game where you have to steal to unlock new equipment.

In Time is Gold you are an unemployed guy that tries to pay the bills and in order to do that he is forced to steal.

Made by BlastWave Games

- Albert Escolar: Modelling, Texturing, Sound FX, HUD artist. https://www.artstation.com/escoly

- Oriol Escolar: Programmer and Animator. @Ury_98

https://sketchfab.com/oriolescolarcano

- Daniel Muñoz: Main Modeller.

- Pol Ferré : 2D Artist.
